question: Which Union minister announce the proposal to set up 100 AYUSH hospitals?
explanation: Minister of state for AYUSH Shripad Yesso Naik announced proposals for setting up of 100 Ayurveda, Unani, Siddha, and Homeopathy (AYUSH) hospitals across the country. Union government had approved posting of 4000 AYUSH doctors in primary health centres across the country. The Ministry has approved setting up of two 50-bedded integrated AYUSH hospitals at Theni and Tiruvannamalai districts in Tamil Nadu.
